name: Pnorar (itch)
description:
What's this?

Pnorar is a bullethell-like topdown spaceshooter with randomly generated upgrades. No stupid retro graphics, no artsy "innovation", no bullshit. Just an honest PC game with fun in mind.

There are no saves. Once you use up your checkpoints the game is over.

Upgrades and bonuses help you. Bonuses are picked up automatically if you touch them. Upgrades, however, need to be confirmed, because they replace your previous upgrade.

The controls are displayed inside the game. You may use your keyboard or a gamepad.

Everything else should be self-explanatory.

Requirements
  • Windows (XP, Vista, 7, 8 or higher), Linux, Mac
  • 1GB RAM
  • Some gaming experience
  • Asian roots*

*optional
